title: sundharathara dhEham
sahitya:
sundaratara dEham vandEham rAmam

anupallavi

 kunda radanamApta kumuda shashankam kandarpa shata kOTi kAntimati niSkaLankam

caraNam 1

 patita jana pAvanam paripAlita bhuvanam shruti nikara sadanam shubhakara vadanam
yativara jIvanam ibharAja pAlanam ditija mada damanam dIna janAvanam
  
caraNam 2

 nava durva daLa nIlam nandita amara jAlam avanata sura pAlam adbhuta lIlam bhavabhaya 
haraNa kAlam bhakta jana vatsalam shivam advaitam amalam shrImad kanakAbha cElam
   
caraNam 3

 Agama sancAram akhila lOkAdhAram vAgAdhipa kumAram vara vIra vIra (vIrAdhivIram) 
rAgAdi samhAram rAghavam udAram tyAgarAja hrd-sancAram kAruNya pArAvAram
